name: Mofang OpenAPI Automation
description: Built-in automation plugin for Mofang (ZJMF) OpenAPI with JWT auth.

not_supported_reasons.port_mapping: mofang openapi has no unified NAT mapping interface
not_supported_reasons.backup: mofang openapi has no unified backup interface
not_supported_reasons.snapshot: mofang openapi has no unified snapshot interface
not_supported_reasons.firewall: mofang openapi has no unified firewall interface
